scripts.api-tests1: newman run Requests/HL7ListenerAPI.json --environment Environments/DEV.json -r cli,htmlextra --reporter-htmlextra-export newman/HL7ListenerAPIReport1.html  --reporter-htmlextra-title API-Test --disable-unicode
